log.content: Create me a website about 3d printers. Make it technical and informative, including information such as calibration, what process should be followed after changing filament etc. Add lots of detail and use a modern design language with the main color being orange. You should create multiple pages, but make sure the main page is available in index.html

function.name: create_file
function.arguments:
{"content":" 3D Printing Info

3D Printing Information Center

  • Introduction
  • Calibration Guide
  • Filament Change Procedures

Welcome to the 3D Printing Resource Hub!

Here you will find in-depth guides and tutorials covering everything from basic setup to advanced calibration techniques.

Calibration Guide

Initial Setup

  1. Install the required software for your 3D printer.
  2. Connect to your printer via USB or Wi-Fi.
  3. Calibrate the Z-axis by moving the nozzle up and down until it's perfectly aligned with the build platform.

Bed Leveling

To ensure high-quality prints, your bed must be level. Follow these steps:

  • Use a digital caliper to measure the nozzle gap at multiple points.
  • Tweak the height settings until all measurements are consistent.

Changing Filaments

The process of changing filament requires care to maintain the quality and consistency of your prints:

  1. Heat up the printer until it's fully operational.
  2. Remove any leftover filament from the nozzle.
  3. Insert new filament into the feeder.
  4. Run a small test print to ensure proper extrusion.

","file_name":"index.html"}
